title: Food is Complicated - Gregway 07.11.24

pretty much um and yeah I don't know I think it's it's a weird thing because I think a lot of people a lot of people deal with eating disorders and issues with food um because it's a very complicated thing and I think we we take for granted that that food is just everywhere and food is normal so people don't have issues right but in reality fast food is addictive in reality you know snacking becomes addictive in reality you know your body image directly correlates to food and you know a lot of people have very unhealthy relationships with food and with their diets and with the way the their body looks um and I definitely fall into that category so um yeah it's it's always going to be a work in progress and it's going to be something that I'm always going to be trying to improve but in reality I think accepting that and realizing that food is a trigger for me and figuring out ways to minimize that harm has been uh a very helpful thing so yeah I hope any of this made sense but um yeah
